main event: Seven objects were observed in the sky, initially thought to be meteors, but they formed a formation and exhibited stunts at high speeds.
interesting points: The objects disappeared behind a hill only to reappear performing maneuvers at speeds between 2000-3000 mph., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes., The observer initially believed the objects were meteors before discounting this as they took formation., Various search lights were noted in the area during the sighting., The interpretation of the sighting suggested that searchlights may have caused the observed phenomena.
sighted object: seven balls of fire in the sky
